class.name: VisualScriptCustomNodes
class.brief_description: Manages custom nodes for the Visual Script editor.
class.description: This singleton can be used to manage (i.e., add or remove) custom nodes for the Visual Script editor.

method.name: add_custom_node
method.description: Add a custom Visual Script node to the editor. It'll be placed under "Custom Nodes" with the [code]category[/code] as the parameter.

method.name: remove_custom_node
method.description: Remove a custom Visual Script node from the editor. Custom nodes already placed on scripts won't be removed.

signal.name: custom_nodes_updated
signal.description: Emitted when a custom Visual Script node is added or removed.
